channel.title: Eclypse Gaming (UPDATED)
channel.description:
Hola, In this thread, I will be advertising Eclypse's development and will hopefully be getting some helpful hands. We are hoping to launch within the week, the server has been worked on for about a month now. There are a few things that need to be done, not many but these things are somewhat vital for launch. Anyway, let's get to it... [center][IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/281c45c.png[/img][/center] [center][size=26pt][b]Features[/b][/size][/center] [center][u][b]What Eclypse Already Has[/b][/u] Payed Webhost and Domain An SMF 2.0 RC3 Forum Creative Staff Some decent GFX Artists A great Ranking System [u][b]What Eclypse Has In-Game[/b][/u]
[b]The Month of October[/b] Organized Donator Rights and Player Rights Fully animated Godwars bosses (Zamorak without anims) Skillcape emotes are under development A unique home area A useful quest tab Many dupes fixed Drops & ExpRates setup to attempt at a stable economy New interfaces Great Combat system [b]November 3rd[/b] Finished Gnome Agility Course with Agility rewards [b]November 5th[/b] Finished PkPoints Poisoning started [b]November 9th[/b] Pest Control Interfaces Added [b]November 10th[/b] Started Home Shops
[u][b]What Eclypse Needs[/b][/u] I have had a hard time with the creation of a Webclient, so a Webclient. Some creative minds for community ideas A few decent server-sided and client-sided developers [/center] [center][size=26pt][b]Applications[/b][/size][/center] [center][size=10pt]Now we are obviously looking for mature people who are decent at there position. But truthfully, i'm doing this entire project as a learning experience and what other way to do it than have fun on the road of creating it. So if your not the most mature person, but you have fun with what you can do and working with other people. Then please, don't hesitate on applying.[/size] [b]What we currently need[/b] - Server Developers - - Client Developers - - Webclient Creator - - Creative Minds - [b]Application[/b] Name: Age: Position Wanted: Past Experience: [/center] [center][size=26pt][b]Pictures[/b][/size][/center] [center][IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/142uaab.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/212742q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/a2sl61.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/t4vhwz.png[/img][/center] [center][b]I can predict what you might say... "Meh, just like any other server". I added some original things that define the server, but other than that... I agree with you. Because to be honest, I don't think i'm going to start the server by bringing completely unique things in. I'm trying to make a line that separates Eclypse from other servers though it's not as easy as it looks. So please, criticize me, not negatively but it really can only help me in the long run.[/b] [/center]

Age: im 14.

Both denied, insufficient information for me to judge you clearly.

item.title: Eclypse Gaming (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Qbix:

For the mean time, yes. To end the beginning development and release the server is my goal at the moment and so I am giving the opportunity to apply for some development positions. However once the server is running, I will not have an application section, I will chose people individually from my personal and co-workers opinions.

I suppose that would be fair enough.

item.title: Eclypse Gaming (UPDATED)
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

Hola,

In this thread, I will be advertising Eclypse’s development and will hopefully be getting some helpful hands. We are hoping to launch within the week, the server has been worked on for about a month now. There are a few things that need to be done, not many but these things are somewhat vital for launch.

Anyway, let’s get to it…

[center][/center]

[center][size=26pt]Features[/size][/center]

[center]What Eclypse Already Has
Payed Webhost and Domain
An SMF 2.0 RC3 Forum
Creative Staff
Some decent GFX Artists
A great Ranking System

What Eclypse Has In-Game

[b]The Month of October[/b] Organized Donator Rights and Player Rights Fully animated Godwars bosses (Zamorak without anims) Skillcape emotes are under development A unique home area A useful quest tab Many dupes fixed Drops & ExpRates setup to attempt at a stable economy New interfaces Great Combat system [b]November 3rd[/b] Finished Gnome Agility Course with Agility rewards [b]November 5th[/b] Finished PkPoints Poisoning started [b]November 9th[/b] Pest Control Interfaces Added [b]November 10th[/b] Started Home Shops

What Eclypse Needs
I have had a hard time with the creation of a Webclient, so a Webclient.
Some creative minds for community ideas
A few decent server-sided and client-sided developers
[/center]

[center][size=26pt]Applications[/size][/center]

[center][size=10pt]Now we are obviously looking for mature people who are decent at there position. But truthfully, i’m doing this entire project as a learning experience and what other way to do it than have fun on the road of creating it. So if your not the most mature person, but you have fun with what you can do and working with other people. Then please, don’t hesitate on applying.[/size]

What we currently need

  • Server Developers -
  • Client Developers -
  • Webclient Creator -
  • Creative Minds -

Application
Name:
Age:
Position Wanted:
Past Experience:
[/center]

[center][size=26pt]Pictures[/size][/center]

[center]

142uaab.png1208×763

212742q.png762×500

[/center]

[center]I can predict what you might say… “Meh, just like any other server”. I added some original things that define the server, but other than that… I agree with you. Because to be honest, I don’t think i’m going to start the server by bringing completely unique things in. I’m trying to make a line that separates Eclypse from other servers though it’s not as easy as it looks. So please, criticize me, not negatively but it really can only help me in the long run. [/center]

Read full topic
